= Introduction =

This is the Wiki of R4nkP477 (a.k.a. RankPatt)

R4nkP477: Pattern finder for Ranking Data. It is based on Euclidean Distance Score. 
Developed by _Jose Damico (jd.comment@gmail.com)_


= Details =

R4nkP477 was designed to be an open-source library to be used for similarities recognition into ranking's data. It also works for form's data analysis.
